name: LockDown Saga
description:
The city is affected by Covid-19 and the player must exit the city and find a vaccine before he gets infected. He has to escape the city by getting on a helicopter before the city is locked down. Each level is a city and the obstacles are virus and people without masks. There are immunity boosters on his way which he can pick up to buy extra time to reach the helicopter.
The final city (level 3) has the vaccination for the player to exit from the pandemic safely and meet his family.
